name: DragonMaster
description: "DragonMaster is a blockchain-based Play-to-Earn game that blends RTS, MOBA, and Collection gameplays. The game has officially launched on March 21, 2022, developed by Magic Hat, which is a technology-focused gaming studio founded in early 2021, aiming to enable players all around the world to profit from happiness. DragonMaster will grow from a blockchain-based Play To Earn game to a Dragon Metaverse featuring virtual characters, residences, even careers. Artists and developers will be able to earn the DMT rewards in the late future. Team Lucas Adams - CEO Lucas Adams has been in charge of establishing and running the DragonMaster team, as well as being engaged in all major product and marketing decisions. Gabriel Nelson - CTO Gabriel Nelson is responsible for all technical and engineering operations. www.linkedin.com/in/gabrielnnelson Partnerships Polygon Studio https://dragonmaster.medium.com/dragonmaster-polygon-studios-partner-to-bring-play-to-earn-games-to-the-metaverse-11dd62cdf396 IGG https://dragonmaster.medium.com/recap-on-ama-with-dragonmaster-x-igg-96b124b822e6 Chainlink https://dragonmaster.medium.com/dragonmaster-integrates-chainlink-vrf-to-help-power-provably-fair-game-mechanics-83a2cf093645 Certik https://www.dragonmaster.co/DragonMaster_Audit_Report_Certik.pdf Apps Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magichat.dragonmaster iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1604169949 Press Releases Clash Royale is recreated by Dragon Master's official launch https://cointelegraph.com/press-releases/clash-royale-is-recreated-by-dragon-masters-official-launch https://blockchair.com/news/classically-clash-royale-is-recreated-by-dragon-masters-official-launch--071a37d835 https://americanheritagebullion.com/blogs/coin-collecting/clash-royale-is-recreated-by-dragon-master-s-official-launch-cointelegraph DragonMaster, a New Play to Earn, Real-Time-Strategy MOBA https://www.playtoearn.online/2021/12/16/dragonmaster-a-new-play-to-earn-real-time-strategy-moba/ DragonMaster Genesis Egg Sale Details Announced! https://www.playtoearn.online/2021/12/20/dragonmaster-genesis-egg-sale-details-announced/ DragonMaster Beta Now Live with 20,000 DMT in Prizes https://www.playtoearn.online/2022/01/04/dragonmaster-beta-now-live-with-20000-dmt-in-prizes/"
